title: Judith Snider | Homeopathy in Richmond Hill
description: Judith Snider provides chiropractic care. Dr. Judith Snider is a Richmond Hill Chiropractor, call us today at 905-770-5131!!
cleaned_text: Homeopathy is a safe and effective natural treatment for a wide variety of problems such as colds, sinusitis, ear infections and sports injuries. We carry a wide range of homeopathic remedies.his includes Traumeet (a natural inflammatory medication). Dr. Snider is a Homeopath, you can book an appointment to determine if homeopathy is right for you. With flu season just around the corner, homeopathic remedies are available to help prevent and treat illnesses such as flu and colds.
